import_guide.launch_game_description: ゲームを起動し、訪問詳細のページを開いたままにしてください
import_guide.open_powershell: Windows PowerShellを起動し、サーバーを選択する
import_guide.copy_command: 下記のコマンドをコピーし、PowerShellに貼って実行してください
import_guide.paste_the_json: ここにコピーしたJSONを貼ってください
import_guide.processing_banner: ピックアップ対象 {bannerName} のデータを処理中...
import_guide.choose_method: インポート方法を選びください
import_guide.open_file_explorer_description: In the address bar, copy the following and press Enter:
import_guide.drag_and_drop_file: Drag and Drop the Player.log file
import_guide.file_upload_zone: Click to upload or drag and drop
import_guide.view_script_content: You can view the script content here
import_guide.submit_global_stats: Submit pull data to global statistics
import_guide.import_privacy_notice: We do not store your access token or use any server-side proxy. All gacha data is fetched directly from the game servers using your provided access token and uid. The import process happens entirely in your browser.

android.download_game_text: Download the Girls' Frontline 2: Exilium from <link>our GitHub releases</link>. Choose either Darkwinter server or Haoplay server.
android.install_nodejs_description: Open Termux and run the following command:
android.rename_xapk_description: Rename the downloaded XAPK file to a simpler name (e.g., 'gf2.xapk')
android.patch_apk_description: Navigate to the XAPK file directory and run APK-MITM:

patch_apk_steps.navigate: 1. Navigate to the download directory (try one of these commands):
patch_apk_steps.run_mitm: 2. Run APK-MITM on the renamed XAPK file:

android.install_game_description: Use XAPK Installer to install the patched game
android.setup_reqable_description: Open Reqable and follow these steps:

reqable_steps.accept_license: 1. Accept the license and choose 'Standalone Mode'
reqable_steps.install_cert: 2. Click the floating button and install the certificate
reqable_steps.export_cert: 4. In the 'Export Certificate' dialog, click 'Save to File'

android.install_cert_description: Install the certificate in Android settings:

capture_steps.open_game: 2. Open the game and go to 'Recruitment'
capture_steps.find_endpoint: 5. Find and press the endpoint containing 'gf2-gacha-record'
capture_steps.copy_headers: 6. In the 'Headers' tab, copy the 'Host' and 'Authorization' values

android.host_placeholder: Enter the Host value from Reqable
android.auth_placeholder: Enter the Authorization value from Reqable
android.uid_description: You can find your UID in the game profile
android.storage_access_description: Allow Termux to access your device's storage
android.risk_notice: Use this method at your own risk. While this only bypasses SSL pinning for HTTPS inspection and doesn't modify game functionality, this method has been tested extensively without any issues and is commonly used for network analysis.
android.x64_device_notice: This method only works on x64/x86-based devices (like Android emulators). It will not work on ARM devices like most Android phones.
android.modified_apk_notice: Warning: This is a modified/patched version of the game APK. While the modification only enables HTTPS inspection for data import and doesn't affect gameplay, using modified APKs always carries risks. Use at your own discretion.

automatic_import.automatic_import_notice: この方法はPowerShellによって自動的にデータを取集します。開始ボタンをクリックした後、PowerShellにコマンドを貼ってください。
automatic_import.automatic_beta_notice: 注意事項：この自動インポート機能はベータ版のテスト中です。問題が起こる可能性もあります。何か問題が起こる場合は、他のインポート方法を変わって、または<link>GitHub</link>で報告してください。
automatic_import.discord_support_notice: 何か不明な点等ございましたら、開発チームのDiscordサーバーに入るとサポートはできます。サーバーリンク：<link>discord.gg/T2vpuvkrKn</link>
automatic_import.retry_import: インポートをリトライする
automatic_import.waiting_for_powershell: PowerShellの実行を待っています
automatic_import.waiting_for_powershell_description: コマンドはすでにコピーしました。PowerShellを開けて、Ctrl+Vでコマンドを貼って実行してください。スクリプトの内容は<link>こちら</link>で確認できます。
automatic_import.authentication_successful_description: PowerShellでサーバーを選択して続いてください...
automatic_import.fetching_records: 訪問履歴を取集しています
automatic_import.fetching_records_description: 訪問履歴の取集が終わるまではお待ちしてください...
automatic_import.import_complete_description: 訪問履歴のインポートは完了しました！
automatic_import.error_server_error_or_invalid_token: サーバーエラー、または無効なtoken
automatic_import.error_failed_to_fetch_records: 訪問履歴の取集が失敗しました

method1.step1: Install Stream - Network Debug Tool from the <link>App Store</link>
method1.step2: Follow the video tutorial until the <mark>1:40</mark> mark

procurement.import_success: インポートは成功しました
procurement.different_uid_warning: Warning: Different UID detected for profile "{profileName}". Previous: {previousUid}, Current: {currentUid}
procurement.server_error_or_invalid_token: サーバーエラー、または無効なtoken
procurement.could_not_find_required_data: Could not find required data in log file
